annotations: I trust you are doing well. I am reaching out to inquire about the availability of two rooms at your hotel on December 31st. Our long-awaited trip to the hills is nearing, and we are eagerly anticipating our stay at your establishment.

I hope you are having a great day. I am reaching out to check the availability of two rooms at your hotel for December 31st. We have planned our hill trip in advance and are excited about our upcoming stay at your property.
